trans-unit.source: My name is Denis Weinhardt, I am 43 years old, married, and a proud father of two children. After many years as an enthusiastic IT aficionado, I decided in 2023 to pursue my dream and advance my professional career in IT. Since February 2023, I have been intensively expanding my knowledge and successfully completed my retraining as an IT specialist in application development.

Currently, I work at Siemens, a globally leading technology company. At the same time, I am completing a certification program as a full-stack developer to further enhance my technical skills and facilitate my transition into an IT career.
Are you seeking a problem solver? Throughout my journey of private and academic IT education, I have developed strong skills in identifying and analyzing challenges in various technical environments.

Do you look for a team player? During my training, I participated in several collaborative projects, where I applied my growing knowledge and gained hands-on experience in solving real-world IT problems as part of a team.
